attributes.action: Demand that the design accepted for the 2012 Olympic Games be scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current design is not only ridiculous and totally irrelevant, but at £400,000, it is also probably the biggest rip-off of our long-suffering public ever.  Whoever accepted the design, and whoever agreed to pay Wolf Olins for it should be fired, and barred from public office for the rest of his or her life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
